alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 31 at 2:29PM AKST until January 04 at 2:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large drifts could form.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
